titleStmt.title: Conciones sex ad Artium Baccalaureos habitae in Die Cinerum pro more in Templo B. Mariæ, ante publicas in scholis disputationes, per totam infequentem quadragefimam ab illis continuandos / per Johannem Prideaux ...
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Excudebat L. Lichfield ..., impensis H. Cripps, H. Curteyne, & T. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
